properties.title: Maven Dashboard Report Plugin : Standard Configuration of historic support

section.name: About Standard Configuration of historic support

subsection.name: Historic dashboard configuration
subsection.p: All generated graphs in the historic view are configured by a predefined default-dashboard-config.xml file.

ul.li:
each report type has 2 generated graphs
one to monitor indicators for the current week
one to monitor indicators for the previous week
